Sections.text: Please complete the following form in its entirety. Any monetary values should be whole numbers no more than eight digits long with no dollar signs, decimals, or commas.
* indicates a required filed

rows.text: * Please choose one of the following that best describes your employment prior to this application

options.label: I am a first time applicant. I have been employed in an LRAP eligible position since graduating from NYU School of Law.
I am a first time applicant. I have been employed in non-LRAP eligible employment (typically a private firm) since graduating from NYU School of Law.
I am continuing/returning participant. I have been employed in an LRAP eligible position since graduating from NYU School of Law.
I am continuing/returning participant. I have previously submitted the Non-LRAP Eligible Employment Form and have remained in LRAP eligible employment since my previous submission.
I am continuing/returning participant. I am renewing my application to earn forgiveness and do not anticipate being eligible for LRAP benefits.

rows.text: *Will you be employed by more than one employer at the same time during the program year?

*Do you anticipate receiving any assistance in the repayment of educational loans from an organization other than NYU? (Please note: if yes, you will be asked to provide additional documentation describing these benefits)

columns.text: Source of assistance (Name of Organization):

rows.text: *Do you anticipate any additional income from employment not listed on this application?

Sections.text: * indicates a required filed
Click on the 'Add Employer' button to submit information about your current employer.

Please complete the following form in its entirety. Any monetary values should be whole numbers no more than eight digits long with no dollar signs, decimals, or commas. You must enter a value in each required box. Enter a '0' if not applicable.
* indicates a required filed

This section allows a LRAP Administrator to fill in an applicant's Student Budget. Any monetary values should be whole numbers no more than eight digits long with no dollar signs, decimals, or commas.
Note: The Total Summer Earnings value displayed below calculates an amount that exceeds $12,000 for each three years (or $36,000).

Total Law Loans:

$122886.00

Total Adjusted Law Loans:

$122886.00
Note: LRAP Eligible Debt is defaulted to the lowest value of either the Total Law Loans or the Calculated Eligible Debt.

Please list each loan on a separate line. Any monetary values should be whole numbers no more than eight digits long with no dollar signs, decimals, or commas. Monthly Payments should match loan bills. Please provide explanation on the Certification page if they do not.
* indicates a required filed

rows.text: *I have Non-Law School educational loans.
*I have consolidated my Non-Law School loans with my Law School loans.
